name: Super Mother Quackers
description:
GAMEPADS REQUIRED

It's finally here! The competitive and hectic multiplayer game where you take control of your own Mother Duck. Collect ducklings, and steal those of your opponents. Dash and dodge your way through a crazy arena jam-packed with hazards. Bring your baby ducks back to the coop and rack up your scoreboard. The Duck Mom with the most points by the end of the round is crowned the winner. Plug in your gamepads and get ready for the new party game that has it all. Download Super MotherQuackers today.

This is a student project made by: Edward Sedelius, Sara Åkerström, Anton Nordling, Gabriel Sánchez, Fredrik Bohlin, Marcel Fontes, Axel Marelius From Futuregames.
